title: Nurse speaks out after being subject of anti-vaccine conspiracy theory
description: Tiffany Dover received the Covid vaccine and fainted when she stood to answer questions at an event. That moment spawned an anti-vaccine conspiracy theory that she died and a body double replaced her. She spoke out for the first time to NBC News’ Brandy Zadrozny about her story.

title: GOP Rep. Nancy Mace says FDA should ignore judge's abortion pill ruling
description: Rep. Nancy Mace of South Carolina said the Food and Drug Administration should ignore a federal judge's ruling that endangers a pill commonly used for abortion.

title: Leaked U.S. documents reveal potential weak links in Ukraine’s military
description: Under relentless Russian attack, Ukraine is burning through air defense missiles, raising the risk Moscow could gain the upper hand in the air, says a leaked U.S. document.

title: State Department designates Evan Gershkovich as wrongfully detained by Russia
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Monday made the formal determination that journalist Evan Gershkovich is being wrongfully detained in Russia.

title: Grand jury indicts the mother of a 6-year-old boy who shot his Virginia teacher
description: The parent of a six-year-old student who shot his first grade teacher earlier this year has been indicted by a grand jury in Virginia, a local prosecutor said.

title: Prosecutors in Lori Vallow murder trial say her husband's ex-wife, Tammy Daybell, died of asphyxiation
description: Prosecutors said during the Lori Vallow murder trial on Monday that her husband's ex-wife, Tammy Daybell, died of asphyxiation.

title: Justice Dept. asks appeals court to block abortion drug ruling that imperils access
description: The DOJ on Monday filed a request in federal court seeking to block a ruling last week by a Trump-appointed judge that endangers access to the key abortion pill mifepristone.

title: More than 200 drugmakers led by Pfizer blast Texas judge's abortion pill decision
description: Over 200 biopharma groups and drugmakers led by Pfizer signed an open letter blasting Texas Judge Matthew Kacsmaryk's hold on federal approval for Mifepristone.

title: Trump moves to block Pence from testifying in special counsel's Jan. 6 probe
description: Former President Trump is moving to block former Vice President Pence from testifying to a federal grand jury probing Trump’s efforts to overturn the 2020 election.

title: South Korea will demand 'appropriate measures' after Pentagon documents leak
description: South Korea will demand the U.S. take "appropriate measures" once the investigation into leaked Pentagon documents detailing U.S. intelligence has concluded, a South Korean senior government official said in a briefing.

title: Nashville council expected to consider reinstating ousted legislator Justin Jones
description: The Nashville council is expected to consider the vacancy in the Tennessee legislature after two Black lawmakers were expelled for protesting gun violence.

title: 'Multiple casualties' confirmed in Louisville after 'active aggressor' incident, police say
description: An "active aggressor" was on the loose in downtown Louisville on Monday morning as police reported "multiple casualties" and urged the public to stay away from the area.

title: How a Nashville suburb’s LGBTQ pride festival became a bitter flashpoint
description: The fight over Franklin Pride near Nashville, Tennessee, echoes earlier battles over LGBTQ acceptance and comes amid a backlash against transgender rights.

title: Analysis: Is a ruling in Texas on abortion the Supreme Court’s next stress test?
description: WASHINGTON — When the Supreme Court overturned the landmark abortion rights ruling Roe v. Wade last summer, the justices were silent about the legality of all the various methods to end a pregnancy.

title: Eyeing re-election, Ted Cruz seeks to burnish a bipartisan image
description: Sen. Ted Cruz built his reputation as a conservative flamethrower, now he's touting his bipartisan credentials as he runs for re-election in Texas in 2024.

title: Conspiracy theorists made Tiffany Dover into an anti-vaxx icon. She’s finally ready to talk about it.
description: HIGDON, Ala. — Tiffany Dover is alive.

title: Biden's 2024 campaign is starting to take shape, minus the announcement
description: White House advisers are set to make final decisions on launching Biden’s re-election bid, even as the would-be candidate is feeling little urgency to formally declare his 2024 plans.

title: Hounded by baseless voter fraud allegations, an entire county's election staff quits in Virginia
description: In Buckingham County, an entire elections staff quit their jobs after a feud between local Republicans and the general registrar consumed the small community

title: House Democrats to introduce bill to shore up abortion pill access after Texas ruling
description: Democratic lawmakers are mobilizing in the wake of the Texas decision that threw access to an abortion pill into flux Friday.

title: Actor Michael Lerner, Oscar-nominated for his role in ‘Barton Fink,’ dies at 81
description: Michael Lerner, an actor who was nominated for an Oscar for his work in Joel and Ethan Coen’s 1991 psychological comedy “Barton Fink,” died Saturday evening.

title: Easter service tinged with frustration for some in Justin Jones' Nashville district
description: NASHVILLE, Tenn. — Hundreds of congregants dressed in white packed into Olive Branch Church for Easter morning service Sunday, but for many, the joyful greetings were followed by anxious chatter over the ouster of state Rep.

title: Leaked secret Pentagon documents lift the lid on U.S. spying on Russia’s war in Ukraine
description: Dozens of leaked Pentagon documents posted online have exposed details of U.S. eavesdropping on Russia’s military campaign in Ukraine. The damage remains unclear.
